summary: An email exchange regarding logistical assistance for a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for August 27, 2019. The email requests FBI agents to help with victim support and managing press presence, noting an anticipated attendance of at least 20 victims.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Epstein case scheduled for 10:30 AM. Anticipated attendance of at least 20 victims, with close to 30 expected. SDNY requested FBI agent assistance for victim support and press management.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for the morning of August 27, 2019.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend, with upwards of 30 anticipated.
The SDNY requested assistance from FBI agents to help with victim support and to avoid the press.
The email indicates coordination among law enforcement for victim-centric logistics during court proceedings.
